markdown.markdown:
::: {.grid} ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6} + **2.2025 -- 5.2025**
Hochschule Bremen
Electrical Engineering and Computer Science ::: ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6} **Postdoctoral researcher** + Project work: AI-based transmission, analysis and verification of handwritten documents ::: :::
::: {.grid} ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6} + **10.2024 -- 3.2025**
Winter semester 2024/25
Hochschule Bremen
School of Nature and Engineering ::: ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6} **Lecturer** + Mathematik 1 ::: :::
::: {.grid} ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6} + **6.2023 -- 6.2024**
University of Münster
Department of Mathematics
Institute for Analysis and Numerics ::: ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6} **Postdoctoral researcher** + Research on discrete hypocoercivity within [DFG project 456849348](https://www.dulbrich.de/research_projects.html) + Keywords: + Hypocoercivity + Kinetic equations + BGK-type approximations + Chemical reactions + Entropy methods + Supervision: [Prof. M. Pirner](https://www.uni-muenster.de/AMM/en/Pirner/index.shtml) ::: :::
::: {.grid} ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6} + **9.2022 -- 2.2023**
affinis AG Bremen ::: ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6} **IT Consulting Internship** ::: :::
::: {.grid} ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6} + **1.2022 -- 6.2022**
Spring semester 2022
Jacobs University Bremen
Mathematical Sciences ::: ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6} **Lecturer** + Finite Mathematics + Introduction to Dynamical Systems ::: :::
::: {.grid} ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6} + **4.2017 -- 9.2021**
University of Bremen
Department of Mathematics
::: ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6} **Research assistant (PhD student)** Research groups: Nonlinear Analysis and Applied Analysis, Stochastics and Dynamical Systems
+ Research within [DFG project number 384027439](https://www.dulbrich.de/research_projects.html) + PhD thesis: *Ergodic theory of nonlinear waves in discrete and continuous excitable media*: + *Advisors:* [Prof. J. Rademacher](https://www.math.uni-hamburg.de/en/forschung/bereiche/am/ang-dynamische-systeme/personen/rademacher-jens.html), [Prof. M. Keßeböhmer](https://www.uni-bremen.de/dynsys/members/prof-dr-marc-kesseboehmer) + *Referees:* Prof. J. Rademacher (University of Bremen), [Prof. I. Melbourne](https://warwick.ac.uk/fac/sci/maths/people/staff/ian_melbourne/) (Warwick University) + Keywords: + Nonlinear analysis + Ergodic Theory + PDE + Excitable media + Cellular automata + Dynamical Systems ::: ::: ## Education ::: {.grid} ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6} + **4.2017 -- 9.2021**
University of Bremen
Department of Mathematics
::: ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6} **Dr. rer. nat. in Mathematics** + PhD thesis: *Ergodic theory of nonlinear waves in discrete and continuous excitable media*: + *Advisors:* [Prof. J. Rademacher](https://www.math.uni-hamburg.de/en/forschung/bereiche/am/ang-dynamische-systeme/personen/rademacher-jens.html), [Prof. M. Keßeböhmer](https://www.uni-bremen.de/dynsys/members/prof-dr-marc-kesseboehmer) + *Referees:* Prof. J. Rademacher (University of Bremen), [Prof. I. Melbourne](https://warwick.ac.uk/fac/sci/maths/people/staff/ian_melbourne/) (Warwick University) + cf. [MGP](https://www.mathgenealogy.org/id.php?id=277103) ::: :::
::: {.grid} ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6} + **4.2016 -- 4.2017**
University of Bremen
Department of Mathematics
::: ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6} **Brückenstipendium, University of Bremen**
+ Further studies + Extensions of the results of my Master's thesis + Successful acquisition of third-party funding (DFG) for my PhD project ::: :::
::: {.grid} ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6} + **until 4.2016**
University of Bremen
Department of Mathematics
::: ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6} **Study of Mathematics**
Master and Bachelor degree (M.Sc. and B.Sc.)
+ M.Sc. thesis: *Dynamics of the three-state 1D Greenberg-Hastings cellular automaton* + *Referees:* Prof. J. Rademacher, [Dr. T. Samuel](https://experts.exeter.ac.uk/43201-tony-samuel/) (University of Exeter) + B.Sc. thesis: *Unerwartete Fehler bei bedingten Erwartungswerten und Wahrscheinlichkeiten* + *Referees:* [Prof. W. Brannath](https://www.uni-bremen.de/kksb/biometrie/team/mitglieder/prof-dr-werner-brannath) (University of Bremen), [Dr. K. Falk](https://www.math.uni-kiel.de/de/dr-kurt-falk/dr-kurt-falk) (University of Kiel) ::: ::: ## Miscellanea ### Grants ::: {.grid} ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6} + **4.2016 -- 4.2017**
University of Bremen
Department of Mathematics ::: ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6} + **[Brückenstipendium](https://www.uni-bremen.de/fileadmin/user_upload/forschung/Anlage/Stipendium/Merkblatt_Brueckenstip.pdf)** ::: ::: ### Supervision ::: {.grid} ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6} + **2021 -- 2022**
University of Bremen
Department of Mathematics ::: ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6} + Student Research Project
*Wave patterns in cellular automata for excitable media*, see [here](https://www.uni-bremen.de/en/fb3/studium-lehre/studentische-projekte/student-research-projects-in-mathematics/assigned-and-completed-projects/wave-patterns-in-cellular-automata-for-excitable-media) ::: ::: ### Organisation ::: {.grid} ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6} + **2016 -- 2021**
University of Bremen
Department of Mathematics ::: ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6} + Supporting several [summer and winter schools](https://www.uni-bremen.de/dynamical-systems/past-events/bremen-summer-and-winter-schools-on-dynamical-systems) + Maintaining the Mathematical Collection of the University of Bremen and creating its website ::: :::
